Name: Vortex Flurry
Intro:
Upon a 3-Ping, Extra DMG Bonus of [Lotus - Flurry] increases by <color=#FF6347>5%</color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — [Lotus - Flurry] pulls in surrounding enemies upon a 3-Ping.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — When casting [Lotus - Flurry] with a 3-Ping while the Signature is active, pressing and holding the Basic Attack button triggers Iaido - Deadly Slash, dealing 360% Lightning DMG.</color>

Name: Glow Lotus Blade
Intro:
When casting [Signature - Lotus Blade], Lucia: Dawn's Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#FF6347>5%</color> for 10s. Its duration will reset every time it is triggered.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — Automatically recovers Signature Energy for 10s after casting the Signature.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Energy of Lotus Blade will not be reduced when Lucia: Dawn is on standby.</color>

Name: Dragon Claw Spin
Intro:
Speed Attack - Dragon Claw Spin: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Pulao: Dragontoll will perform a powerful counterattack move <color=#FF6347>Dragon Claw Spin</color>, launching the target into the air and strangling it with her legs before spinning and slamming it to the ground. Depending on the Rank of Pulao: Dragontoll, <color=#FF6347>Dragon Claw Spin</color> will deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge, while dealing <color=#FF6347>350%</color> Physical DMG to other surrounding targets.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Upon a successful Dodge, Pulao: Dragontoll will perform a powerful counterattack move <color=#FF6347>Dragon Claw Spin</color>, launching the target into the air and strangling it with her legs before spinning and slamming it to the ground. Depending on the Rank of Pulao: Dragontoll, <color=#FF6347>Dragon Claw Spin</color> will deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge, while dealing <color=#FF6347>391.18%</color> Physical DMG to other surrounding targets.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Dragon Claw Spin

Name: Whirlwind Strike
Intro:

Finishing Move - Whirlwind Strike: When the target has an empty Finisher Gauge and is within the range of <color=#FF6347>Whirlwind Strike</color>, tapping Basic Attack will summon Dragon Axe at the target's location to suppress it and its surrounding units, dealing <color=#FF6347>964.71%</color> Physical DMG. Pulao: Dragontoll will then toss the target out of the battlefield.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#FF6347>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#FF6347>20%</color> faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: <color=#FF6347>Dragon Claw Spin</color> deals <color=#FF6347>100% more Physical DMG to surrounding targets</color>. Slamming the target to the ground will trigger the <color=#FF6347>Dragon Cloudspring</color> effect.

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: <color=#FF6347>Dragon Claw Spin</color> deals <color=#FF6347>100% more Physical DMG to surrounding targets</color>. Slamming the target to the ground will trigger the <color=#FF6347>Dragon Cloudspring</color> effect.

Name: Enhanced Finishing Move
Intro: Able to move when performing <color=#FF6347>Whirlwind Strike</color> and deal an additional <color=#FF6347>400%</color> Physical DMG to surrounding units. All targets in the area that can be finished will be thrown off the battlefield by Dragon Axe.

Name: Enhanced Finishing Move
Intro: Able to move when performing <color=#FF6347>Whirlwind Strike</color> and deal an additional <color=#FF6347>400%</color> Physical DMG to surrounding units. All targets in the area that can be finished will be thrown off the battlefield by Dragon Axe.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team uses a Finishing Move, the next incoming Vanguard Uniframe's Class Skill increases by <color=#FF6347>50%</color>, and its duration extends by 15s.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team uses a Finishing Move, the next incoming Vanguard Uniframe's Class Skill increases by <color=#FF6347>50%</color>, and its duration extends by 15s.

Name: Tango Chainblade
Intro:
Speed Attack - Tango Chainblade: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Roland: Flambeau will perform a powerful counterattack move <color=#FF6347>Tango Chainblade</color>, grabbing the target with his Chain Blade and launching it into the air before slamming the target to the ground behind him. Depending on the Rank of Roland: Flambeau, <color=#FF6347>Tango Chainblade</color> will deal Fire DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge, while dealing <color=#FF6347>150%</color> Fire DMG to other surrounding targets.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Depending on the Rank of Roland: Flambeau, <color=#FF6347>Tango Chainblade</color> will deal Fire DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge, while dealing <color=#FF6347>282.35%</color> Fire DMG to other surrounding targets.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#FF6347>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Curtain Call
Intro:
Finishing Move - Curtain Call: When the target has an empty Finisher Gauge and is within the range of <color=#FF6347>Curtain Call</color>, tapping Basic Attack will perform the Finishing Move <color=#FF6347>Curtain Call</color>: Roland trips up the target and steps on it to fire at its head, immediately eliminating the target while knocking back surrounding enemies, dealing <color=#FF6347>400%</color> Fire DMG.

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: The landing spot can be adjusted with the left joystick after grabbing an enemy with Speed Attack - Tango Chainblade. Gains an Incinerating Orb. (8s cooldown; only 1 Incinerating Orb will be granted at a time by this effect.)

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: The landing spot can be adjusted with the left joystick after grabbing an enemy with Speed Attack - Tango Chainblade. Gains an Incinerating Orb. (8s cooldown; only 1 Incinerating Orb will be granted at a time by this effect.)

Name: Enhanced Finishing Move
Intro: When Roland's chain blade or Technique Attack hits an enemy, tapping the Basic Attack button immediately will pull in enemies that are not in range of the Finishing Move and finish them off. After performing <color=#FF6347>Finishing Move - Curtain Call</color>, he will swing his chain blade back and forth across the battlefield and fire 8 incendiary bombs the next time he exits the field, dealing a total of <color=#FF6347>1600%</color> Fire DMG.

Name: Enhanced Finishing Move
Intro: When Roland's chain blade or Technique Attack hits an enemy, tapping the Basic Attack button immediately will pull in enemies that are not in range of the Finishing Move and finish them off. After performing <color=#FF6347>Finishing Move - Curtain Call</color>, he will swing his chain blade back and forth across the battlefield and fire 8 incendiary bombs the next time he exits the field, dealing a total of <color=#FF6347>1600%</color> Fire DMG.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team finishes an enemy, restores <color=#FF6347>20%</color> of self max HP and increases Fire DMG of all Uniframes in the team by <color=#FF6347>10%</color> for 15s.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team finishes an enemy, restores <color=#FF6347>20%</color> of self max HP and increases Fire DMG of all Uniframes in the team by <color=#FF6347>10%</color> for 15s.

Name: Bipolar Expansion
Intro:
Explosion DMG from [Infernal Shot]'s blasting round increases by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>5%</color>%</color></color>. The burning area created by [Infernal Shot] will inflict Burn on enemies for 3s. Enemies inflicted with Burn are considered to be in the burning area.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — When [Magnetic Shot] hits a target with Burn, extends the Burn status for 3s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — When Lee: Palefire attacks an enemy inflicted with Burn, the Base DMG of [Infernal Shot]'s additional Extra DMG increases by 100%.</color>

Explosion DMG from [Infernal Shot]'s blasting round increases by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>6.47%</color>%</color></color>. The burning area created by [Infernal Shot] will inflict Burn on enemies for 3s. Enemies inflicted with Burn are considered to be in the burning area.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — When [Magnetic Shot] hits a target with Burn, extends the Burn status for 3s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — When Lee: Palefire attacks an enemy inflicted with Burn, the Base DMG of [Infernal Shot]'s additional Extra DMG increases by 100%.</color>

Name: Center Axis Relock
Intro:
After casting [Controlling Bullet], Lee: Palefire's movement speed increases, and he enters <color=#FF6347>Blasting Mode</color> for 5s, performing Continuous Fire with his Dual Guns at the target. DMG dealt by each shot is based on the number of Red Orbs pinged when casting [Controlling Bullet]. In this mode, Lee: Palefire deals Fire DMG instead of Physical DMG, and Fire DMG increases by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>5%</color></color>. Pinging orbs will grant extra effects:
 
Red Orbs: Extends <color=#FF6347>Blasting Mode</color> by <color=#FF6347>0.5/1/1.5</color>s based on the number of orbs pinged. Each shot deals DMG equal to the DMG dealt by the corresponding number of orbs pinged by [Precise Shots].
Yellow and Blue Orbs: Lee: Palefire dodges to the side when pinged, and <color=#FF6347>Blasting Mode</color> extends by <color=#FF6347>0.3</color>s.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — In Blasting Mode, each successful shot during Continuous Fire will grant 1 Energy. Energy gained from pinging orbs is doubled.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — In Blasting Mode, dodging will consume twice the amount of Dodge and trigger Evasive Shot: Lee: Palefire leaps into the air and quickly fires 11 times, gaining 21 Energy and dealing 45% Fire DMG with each shot. Gains Invincible during Evasive Shot. Successfully dodging with Evasive Shot will recover the extra Dodge consumed.</color>

Name: Center Axis Relock
Intro:
After casting [Controlling Bullet], Lee: Palefire's movement speed increases, and he enters <color=#FF6347>Blasting Mode</color> for 5s, performing Continuous Fire with his Dual Guns at the target. DMG dealt by each shot is based on the number of Red Orbs pinged when casting [Controlling Bullet]. In this mode, Lee: Palefire deals Fire DMG instead of Physical DMG, and Fire DMG increases by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>6.47%</color></color>. Pinging orbs will grant extra effects:
 
Red Orbs: Extends <color=#FF6347>Blasting Mode</color> by <color=#FF6347>0.5/1/1.5</color>s based on the number of orbs pinged. Each shot deals DMG equal to the DMG dealt by the corresponding number of orbs pinged by [Precise Shots].
Yellow and Blue Orbs: Lee: Palefire dodges to the side when pinged, and <color=#FF6347>Blasting Mode</color> extends by <color=#FF6347>0.3</color>s.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — In Blasting Mode, each successful shot during Continuous Fire will grant 1 Energy. Energy gained from pinging orbs is doubled.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — In Blasting Mode, dodging will consume twice the amount of Dodge and trigger Evasive Shot: Lee: Palefire leaps into the air and quickly fires 11 times, gaining 21 Energy and dealing 45% Fire DMG with each shot. Gains Invincible during Evasive Shot. Successfully dodging with Evasive Shot will recover the extra Dodge consumed.</color>

In this mode, Lee: Palefire deals Fire DMG instead of Physical DMG, and Fire DMG increases by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>12.06%</color></color>. Pinging orbs will grant extra effects:
 
Red Orbs: Extends <color=#FF6347>Blasting Mode</color> by <color=#FF6347>0.5/1/1.5</color>s based on the number of orbs pinged. Each shot deals DMG equal to the DMG dealt by the corresponding number of orbs pinged by [Precise Shots].
Yellow and Blue Orbs: Lee: Palefire dodges to the side when pinged, and <color=#FF6347>Blasting Mode</color> extends by <color=#FF6347>0.3</color>s.
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.9 — In Blasting Mode, each successful shot during Continuous Fire will grant 1 Energy. Energy gained from pinging orbs is doubled.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.18 — In Blasting Mode, dodging will consume twice the amount of Dodge and trigger Evasive Shot: Lee: Palefire leaps into the air and quickly fires 11 times, gaining 21 Energy and dealing 45% Fire DMG with each shot. Gains Invincible during Evasive Shot. Successfully dodging with Evasive Shot will recover the extra Dodge consumed.</color>

Name: Flaming Cyclone
Intro:
Deals Fire DMG with [Signature - 360° Shooting] instead. While casting [Signature - 360° Shooting], Fire DMG dealt by Lee: Palefire increases by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>5%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — Casting [Signature - 360° Shooting] will pull in surrounding enemies continuously.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Hitting an enemy with [Signature - 360° Shooting] will inflict Burn for 3s, dealing Fire DMG based on the level of [Infernal Shot] every 0.5s. In Blasting Mode, the Base DMG of [Signature - 360° Shooting] increases by 40%.</color>

Name: CA - Diamond Dust
Intro:
Speed Attack - CA - Diamond Dust: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color>. When Haicma: Starveil successfully dodges the attack in this way or is hit by an enemy's <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color> during <color=#FF6347>Bitterfrost Level</color>, she will amass Frost Wind and move it toward the direction of the joystick. Depending on the Rank of Haicma: Starveil, hitting the target who performed the <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color> with her Frost Wind will deal Ice DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. Hitting other targets with her Frost Wind will deal <color=#FF6347>150%</color> Ice DMG.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Depending on the Rank of Haicma: Starveil, hitting the target who performed the <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color> with her Frost Wind will deal Ice DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. Hitting other targets with her Frost Wind will deal <color=#FF6347>255.88%</color> Ice DMG.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#FF6347>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Depending on the Rank of Haicma: Starveil, hitting the target who performed the <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color> with her Frost Wind will deal Ice DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. Hitting other targets with her Frost Wind will deal <color=#FF6347>450%</color> Ice DMG.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#FF6347>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#FF6347>20%</color> faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: EX - Glacial Burial
Intro:
Finishing Move - EX - Glacial Burial: When the target has an empty Finisher Gauge and is within the range of <color=#FF6347>EX - Glacial Burial</color>, tapping Basic Attack will have Haicma: Starveil suppress the target, annihilating it with her Scythe while dealing <color=#FF6347>400%</color> Ice DMG to surrounding enemies.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Intro: After any Uniframe in the team uses a Finishing Move, the Vanguard Skill effect of the next entering Uniframe increases by <color=#FF6347>50%</color>, and its duration extends by 15s.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team uses a Finishing Move, the Vanguard Skill effect of the next entering Uniframe increases by <color=#FF6347>50%</color>, and its duration extends by 15s.

Name: Predator's Charge
Intro:
Speed Attack - Predator's Charge: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Camu: Crocotta will lunge toward the enemy, slamming it to the ground to deal <color=#FF6347>250%</color> Dark DMG and then launching it into the air to deal <color=#FF6347>250%</color> Dark DMG. Depending on the Rank of Camu: Crocotta, <color=#FF6347>Predator's Charge</color> will deal Dark DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Finishing Move - Fatal Shadow: Camu: Crocotta channels the dark energy to break the enemy's will and executes it while unleashing a shockwave that deals <color=#FF6347>1035.29%</color> Dark DMG in a large area.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#FF6347>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#FF6347>20%</color> faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: After casting <color=#FF6347>Predator's Charge</color>, Camu: Crocotta drags the enemy for an extra distance, dealing <color=#FF6347>400%</color> DMG while pulling in surrounding enemies. Changes direction with the joystick.

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: After casting <color=#FF6347>Predator's Charge</color>, Camu: Crocotta drags the enemy for an extra distance, dealing <color=#FF6347>400%</color> DMG while pulling in surrounding enemies. Changes direction with the joystick.

Name: Enhanced Finishing Move
Intro: The shockwave Camu: Crocotta unleashes after casting <color=#FF6347>Fatal Shadow</color> deals an extra <color=#FF6347>800%</color> Dark DMG, and he gains 3 stacks of Madness afterward. If he is in Berserk mode, gains 2 random Signal Orbs immediately.

Name: Enhanced Finishing Move
Intro: The shockwave Camu: Crocotta unleashes after casting <color=#FF6347>Fatal Shadow</color> deals an extra <color=#FF6347>800%</color> Dark DMG, and he gains 3 stacks of Madness afterward. If he is in Berserk mode, gains 2 random Signal Orbs immediately.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team uses a Finishing Move, the Vanguard Skill effect of the next entering Uniframe increases by <color=#FF6347>50%</color>, and its duration extends by 15s.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team uses a Finishing Move, the Vanguard Skill effect of the next entering Uniframe increases by <color=#FF6347>50%</color>, and its duration extends by 15s.

Name: Spiritual Prayer Dance
Intro:
[QTE - Heroic Dance] heals <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>10%</color></color> more HP and grants <color=#FF6347>Ultralimit Torque</color> to the targets healed, increasing their Physical DMG Bonus by <color=#FF6347>10%</color> for <color=#FF6347>8s</color>. Its duration will reset every time it is triggered.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — [QTE - Heroic Dance] triggers an additional Light Penalty of Core Passive's level.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — [QTE - Heroic Dance] grants 12 Energy after triggering Light Penalty. [Passive - Field Reinforcement] New Effect: The effect of Ultralimit Torque increases to 20%.</color>

Its duration will reset every time it is triggered.
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.9 — [QTE - Heroic Dance] triggers an additional Light Penalty of Core Passive's level.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.18 — [QTE - Heroic Dance] grants 12 Energy after triggering Light Penalty. [Passive - Field Reinforcement] New Effect: The effect of Ultralimit Torque increases to 20%.</color>

Name: Sacred Chain
Intro:
[Goddess Connection System] will trigger an additional Light Penalty upon a 3-Ping. After Light Penalty has been triggered <color=#FF6347>4</color> times, the next Light Penalty triggered will become <color=#FF6347>Divine Penalty</color>, dealing <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>200%</color></color> DMG. [Passive - Pioneer of Glory] also increases Divine Penalty's DMG as it does to Light Penalty.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — [Goddess Connection System] has a 50% chance to trigger Light Penalty and the targets healed will be granted Ultralimit Torque.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Liv: Luminance increases the CRIT DMG of the targets healed by 20%. Triggering Light Penalty and Divine Penalty will increase the next deployed character's CRIT Rate by 5% and 25% respectively for 10s until it reaches its maximum at 75%. [Passive - Pioneer of Glory] New Effect: Liv: Luminance gains 100 Energy upon entering the battlefield for the first time.</color>

After Light Penalty has been triggered <color=#FF6347>4</color> times, the next Light Penalty triggered will become <color=#FF6347>Divine Penalty</color>, dealing <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>458.82%</color></color> DMG. [Passive - Pioneer of Glory] also increases Divine Penalty's DMG as it does to Light Penalty.
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.9 — [Goddess Connection System] has a 50% chance to trigger Light Penalty and the targets healed will be granted Ultralimit Torque.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.18 — Liv: Luminance increases the CRIT DMG of the targets healed by 20%. Triggering Light Penalty and Divine Penalty will increase the next deployed character's CRIT Rate by 5% and 25% respectively for 10s until it reaches its maximum at 75%. [Passive - Pioneer of Glory] New Effect: Liv: Luminance gains 100 Energy upon entering the battlefield for the first time.</color>

Name: Divine Rage Field
Intro:
When [Signature - Arcadia Gate] is active, pinging orbs will trigger <color=#FF6347>Light Penalty</color> <color=#FF6347>1/2/3</color> times based on the number of Orbs pinged and it deals <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>15%</color></color> more Physical DMG.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — When [Signature - Arcadia Gate] is activated, nearby enemies will be pulled continuously and Divine Penalty's Base DMG increases by 10%.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — [Signature - Arcadia Gate] Liv: Luminance gains 40 Energy every time she enters the battlefield. When her Signature Move is active, she can be switched to other characters and exit the Signature Move state. [Passive - Consciousness Encouragement] New Effect: It lasts 15s and also applies to standby characters. Divine Penalty deals 25% more DMG.</color>

Name: Viridescent Gust
Intro:
Speed Attack - Viridescent Gust: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Qu: Pavo will send Huiyu to grab the enemy. Depending on Qu's Rank, <color=#FF6347>Viridescent Gust</color> will deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. While casting Viridescent Gust, she will also generate a whirlwind that pulls in nearby targets and deals <color=#FF6347>150%</color> Physical DMG. If Huiyu is already on the field when <color=#FF6347>Viridescent Gust</color> is cast, its duration will be refreshed.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Depending on Qu's Rank, <color=#FF6347>Viridescent Gust</color> will deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. While casting Viridescent Gust, she will also generate a whirlwind that pulls in nearby targets and deals <color=#FF6347>441.18%</color> Physical DMG. If Huiyu is already on the field when <color=#FF6347>Viridescent Gust</color> is cast, its duration will be refreshed.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#FF6347>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#FF6347>20%</color> faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Satellite Blade
Intro:
When Trailblade hits the target in Enhanced Shadow Form, it will leave two <color=#FF6347>Shadow Blades</color> on the target and restore <color=#FF6347>100</color> Dodge Gauge. Each Shadow Blade deals <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>60%</color></color> Dark DMG (up to 6 Shadow Blades can stack on each target).
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — When [Cosmic Wave] is triggered, its Base DMG increases by 50% for each additional Red Orb pinged. Base DMG of Trailblade increases by 20% in Enhanced Shadow Form.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — After dodging or pinging a Red Orb in Enhanced Shadow Form, press and hold Basic Attack to unleash Dark Blade that deals 150% Dark DMG for each Shadow Blade on the target. When the 6th hit of Dark Blade is triggered, its DMG increases to 300% and the duration of Enhanced Shadow Form extends by 2s.</color>

Each Shadow Blade deals <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>95.29%</color></color> Dark DMG (up to 6 Shadow Blades can stack on each target).
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.9 — When [Cosmic Wave] is triggered, its Base DMG increases by 50% for each additional Red Orb pinged. Base DMG of Trailblade increases by 20% in Enhanced Shadow Form.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — After dodging or pinging a Red Orb in Enhanced Shadow Form, press and hold Basic Attack to unleash Dark Blade that deals 150% Dark DMG for each Shadow Blade on the target. When the 6th hit of Dark Blade is triggered, its DMG increases to 300% and the duration of Enhanced Shadow Form extends by 2s.</color>

Name: Fang-shattering Wolf
Intro:
Speed Attack - Fang-shattering Wolf: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete the Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Noan: Arca will rapidly travel across the battlefield to knock the enemy into the air, then slam it to the ground. Depending on the Rank of Noan: Arca, <color=#FF6347>Lightning Blast</color> will deal Lightning DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. While casting this skill, Noan gains 1 Gear Level and pulls in surrounding enemies, dealing <color=#FF6347>200%</color> Lightning DMG.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Finishing Move - Voltaic Burst: When the target has an empty Finisher Gauge and is within the range of <color=#FF6347>Voltaic Burst</color>, tap Basic Attack to have Noan: Arca knock down the target and continuously rev his Rev Blade to trigger an explosion that executes the target. Also deals <color=#FF6347>423.53%</color> Lightning DMG to surrounding enemies.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Shining Wings
Intro:
[Hunter of Sin]'s Base DMG increases by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>5%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — [QTE - Wings of Destiny] also pulls in nearby enemies.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — [QTE - Wings of Destiny] also recovers 15 Signature Energy. New effect of [Passive - Lance of Redemption] added: After hitting a target with [Hunter of Sin], Rosetta: Rigor gains 10% Extra DMG Bonus against this target for 8s. (This effect does not stack with the Extra DMG Bonus triggered by [Frozen Wind] from [Passive - Lance of Redemption].)</color>

Name: Raging Surge
Intro:
<color=#FF6347>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color>'s Base DMG increases by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>5%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon also pulls in nearby enemies. After casting [Signature - Absolving Spear], the next low/mid-power electromagnetic cannon's Base DMG increases by 100%.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Low/Mid-power/Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon generates an extra 3 Signature Energy. After casting Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon, Rosetta: Rigor becomes Overloaded for 4s, during which all 3-Pings and Signature Move will receive the maximum Energy Point bonus. New effect of [Passive - Lance of Eternity] added: Lance of Perception inflicts Penetrating Pivot that reduces target's Physical Resistance by 5%.</color>

Name: Eradication of Sins
Intro:
[Signature - Absolving Spear] has its Base DMG increased by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>5%</color></color> and also activates all available QTEs when cast.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Rosetta: Rigor recovers 10 Signature Energy each time she enters battle.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — When [Signature - Absolving Spear] is cast, press and hold Basic Attack to start charging. Rosetta: Rigor becomes invincible while charging and will fire a Low/Mid-power/Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon based on the charging time and whether she is in Full Burst Form. New effect of [Passive - Hyper-Burst] added: The Penetrating Pivot effect from Lance of Perception increases to 10%.</color>

[Signature - Absolving Spear] has its Base DMG increased by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>6.76%</color></color> and also activates all available QTEs when cast.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Rosetta: Rigor recovers 10 Signature Energy each time she enters battle.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — When [Signature - Absolving Spear] is cast, press and hold Basic Attack to start charging. Rosetta: Rigor becomes invincible while charging and will fire a Low/Mid-power/Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon based on the charging time and whether she is in Full Burst Form. New effect of [Passive - Hyper-Burst] added: The Penetrating Pivot effect from Lance of Perception increases to 10%.</color>

Name: Modulated Timbre
Intro:
Speed Attack - Modulated Timbre: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete the Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Selena will leap up to avoid the enemy's attack and then slash at a high speed. Depending on her Rank, <color=#FF6347>Modulated Timbre</color> will deal Lightning DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge, while dealing <color=#FF6347>350%</color> Lightning DMG to other surrounding targets.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Speed Attack - Modulated Timbre: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete the Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Selena will leap up to avoid the enemy's attack and then slash at a high speed. Depending on her Rank, <color=#FF6347>Modulated Timbre</color> will deal Lightning DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge, while dealing <color=#FF6347>473.53%</color> Lightning DMG to other surrounding targets.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Modulated Timbre
Intro:
Speed Attack - Modulated Timbre: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete the Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#FF6347>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Selena will leap up to avoid the enemy's attack and then slash at a high speed. Depending on her Rank, <color=#FF6347>Modulated Timbre</color> will deal Lightning DMG equal to <color=#FF6347>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#FF6347>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge, while dealing <color=#FF6347>1050%</color> Lightning DMG to other surrounding targets.

After any Uniframe in the team finishes an enemy, heals self for <color=#FF6347>20%</color> of max HP and increases Lightning DMG of all Uniframes in the team by <color=#FF6347>10%</color> for 15s.
 
<color=#645F5D></color>
 
<color=#645F5D></color>

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro:
After any Uniframe in the team finishes an enemy, heals self for <color=#FF6347>20%</color> of max HP and increases Lightning DMG of all Uniframes in the team by <color=#FF6347>10%</color> for 15s.
 
<color=#645F5D></color>
 
<color=#645F5D></color>

Name: Scorching Peril
Intro:
Base DMG and Healing of [Infernal Scorchmark] increase by <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>10%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — After Vera is switched out, she performs Core Attack once to a random target within Night Field/Dark Field every 1.5s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Whenever Vera's Core Attack/Dark Night Slash hits an enemy marked by [Infernal Scorchmark] while Night Field/Dark Field is present, the mark will be removed, dealing Explosion DMG and performing Healing equal to the full amount of the [Infernal Scorchmark] effect. [Infernal Scorchmark] spreads to another random enemy within range afterward.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.18 — Whenever Vera's <color=#FF6347>Core Attack/Dark Night Slash</color> hits an enemy marked by [Infernal Scorchmark] while <color=#FF6347>Night Field/Dark Field</color> is present, the mark will be removed, dealing Explosion DMG and performing Healing equal to the full amount of the [Infernal Scorchmark] effect. [Infernal Scorchmark] spreads to another random enemy within range afterward.</color>

Name: Void of Darkness
Intro:
Upon casting the Signature Move with maximum Overclocking Points, Vera enters the <color=#FF6347>Darkness Form</color>, dealing <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>240%</color></color> Dark DMG to the surrounding area and creating a <color=#FF6347>Night Field</color> afterward, which deals <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>60%</color></color> Dark DMG per second for 6s. She cannot gain Signature Energy and Overclocking Points while in <color=#FF6347>Darkness Form</color>. Unleashing all <color=#FF6347>Core Attacks/Dark Night Slashes</color> in <color=#FF6347>Darkness Form</color> will activate <color=#FF6347>[Signature - Dark Night's End]</color>, dealing <color=#FF6347>800%</color> Dark DMG and ending the Darkness Form.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — Vera gains 80 Energy and a random Signal Orb when she enters the battle. Upon casting [Signature - Dark Night's End], all remaining Darkness Orbs are converted to Blue Orbs (max 3).</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Creates a Dark Field immediately after casting [Signature - Dark Night's End].</color>

Name: Illusive Disruption
Intro:
Vera can perform <color=#FF6347>Core Attacks</color> anytime while she is in <color=#FF6347>Darkness Form</color>, and all Orbs are converted to Darkness Orbs. Pings Darkness Orbs to perform Dark Night Slash, dealing <color=#FF6347><color=#FF6347>300%</color></color> Dark DMG.
Dark Night Slashes come with additional Dodge Calculation. Triggering the Matrix will grant 2 Darkness Orbs, and exiting <color=#FF6347>Core Attacks</color> will turn Darkness Orbs back to normal Signal Orbs.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — Consecutive Dark Night Slashes deal increasing DMG, the Base DMG increasing by 0%/25%/50%/75% respectively.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — In Darkness Form, pinging a Signal Orb/Darkness Orb will increase the Base DMG of [Signature - Dark Night's End] by 50% (max 200%).</color>
